comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Matches the entity against the passed in options.
Uses the location of the entity for matching if the location is not specified in the passed in {@link EntityQueryOptions}.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The query to perform the match against.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: Returns true if the entity matches the criteria in the passed in {@link EntityQueryOptions}, otherwise it returns false.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: Throws if the query options are misconfigured.
